name: Create Food and Water
effect: food and water to sustain three humans or one horse/level for 24 hours
text: The food that this spell creates is simple fare of your choice—highly nourishing, if rather bland. Food so created decays and becomes inedible after 24 hours, although it can be kept fresh for another 24 hours by casting a purify food and water spell on it. The water created by this spell is just like clean rain water, and it doesn't go bad as the food does.
effect_zh: 足以供养三个人类或一匹马24小时所需的食物与水
text_zh: 该法术仅能创造出你所选择的简单食物——这种食物富含营养，但是清淡无味。如此创造的食物会在24小时后变得腐烂而不能食用，不过对这些食物施放‘净化食粮 (purify food and drink)’则可以使之在额外24小时内保持新鲜。该法术创造出的水如同洁净的雨水一般，而且不会如同食物那样腐烂。
